name: Baldi's Underwater Adventure!
description:
Please rate my game!

Collect Notebooks and avoid Baldi in this strange, colorful adventure!

Play in Browser or download for Windows

WASD, LMB/E=Interact, F=Flashlight, C=Crouch, Space=Look Behind

Made for the Water Themed Game Jam - February 2021 using custom code and some free assets and models.

Additional gameplay will be added in the near future, more enemies, weapons, collectibles, etc.
